phrases.original: Ask the recipient to scan this barcode. This will open the invite in their Web browser.
phrases.translated: Ask the recipient to scan this barcode. This will open the invite in their Web browser.

phrases.original: Have the recipient open the camera app on their cell phone, then point it at this barcode (without taking a picture). A prompt should appear on their screen. By pressing a button in that prompt, the invite will open in their Web browser. (If this doesn't work, have them scan the barcode with a QR Code app).
phrases.translated: Have the recipient open the camera app on their cell phone, then point it at this barcode (without taking a picture). A prompt should appear on their screen. By pressing a button in that prompt, the invite will open in their Web browser. (If this doesn't work, have them scan the barcode with a QR Code app).

phrases.original: Tag invite with my current location
phrases.translated: Tag invite with my current location

phrases.original: This invite has been saved to your account, enabling you to follow up. You will be notified by e-mail when the recipient has clicked and viewed the invite.
phrases.translated: This invite has been saved to your account, enabling you to follow up. You will be notified by e-mail when the recipient has clicked and viewed the invite.

phrases.original: This invite has been saved to your account. You will be notified by e-mail when the recipient has clicked and viewed the invite.
phrases.translated: This invite has been saved to your account. You will be notified by e-mail when the recipient has clicked and viewed the invite.

phrases.original: Now you must immediately do the following:
phrases.translated: Now you must immediately do the following:

phrases.original: Open any messaging app that {RECIPIENT-NAME} uses.
phrases.translated: Open any messaging app that {RECIPIENT-NAME} uses.

phrases.original: Paste the invite into the message and send.
phrases.translated: Paste the invite into the message and send.

phrases.original: When {RECIPIENT-NAME} clicks and views the invite that you pasted, you will be notified via e-mail.
phrases.translated: When {RECIPIENT-NAME} clicks and views the invite that you pasted, you will be notified via e-mail.

phrases.original: Retry, perhaps using another sending method.
phrases.translated: Retry, perhaps using another sending method.

phrases.original: Retry, or perhaps retry by using another sending method.
phrases.translated: Retry, or perhaps retry by using another sending method.
